ModMetaData.name: Comms Ambiance UwU
ModMetaData.author: Scurvyez
ModMetaData.description:
Discord: steveo.o steam: Scurvyez
Be gone sounds! Uwu
This mod does one simple thing. It allows you to adjust the volume of the ambient ship passing sound which plays while the comms console is used to trade with passing ships or talk with various factions.\n\nUse the mod settings. Uwu
